name: birds-on-earth-radio-globe
description: Birds-on-Earth-Radio-globe Explore the real-time soundscape of our planet. Tune into live birdsong or listen to thousands of global radio stations on an interactive 3D globe. Experience the rich auditory tapestry of nature and human culture, side-by-side.

scripts.build:web: echo "Web build complete - static files ready"
scripts.build:android: npx cap copy android && npx cap sync android
scripts.build:aab: npm run build:web && npm run build:android && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease
scripts.build:aab:debug: npm run build:web && npm run build:android && cd android && ./gradlew bundleDebug

author: Orwebcraft Ecologists Association
